title: I pressed the link to the fake Christmas RP giveaway
body: I only pressed the link without knowing what it was and was sent to the usual scam site. I did not press anything on the site itself though and immediately left. Is there any risk of my account being compromised or my passwords?

replies.body: I can't measure the risk, but I can offer ways to help keep yourself protected in and out of league.  To start, I suggest [resetting your password](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) just to be safe!  Go over to our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for some safety practice tips to help!  It sounds like you haven't really submitted anything to the phishing link, so I think you'll be okay!

Thank you very much :)

Oh and no I haven't. I only pressed the link I was sent by a friend via chat
